Q&A.content: A 170 year-old Champagne Bottle was found under the sea in 2010. It was tasted by scientist and guess what? It was still good to drink.

answers.true:
It is TRUE indeed!
The bottle was found among 168 others in the cave of a shipwreck at the bottom of the cold Baltic sea. Protected from the sunlight and by the cold temperature of the sea, it was amazingly well-preserved, and kept the tasters amazed.
